## TextStyleCache.createRenderStyle() method

Gets the appropriate \[\[TextRenderStyle\]\] to use for a label. Depends heavily on the label's \[\[Technique\]\] and the current zoomLevel.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createRenderStyle(tile: Tile, technique: TextTechnique | PoiTechnique | LineMarkerTechnique): TextRenderStyle;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tile | [Tile](./harp-mapview.tile.md) |  |
|  technique | [TextTechnique](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechnique.md) \| [PoiTechnique](./harp-datasource-protocol.poitechnique.md) \| [LineMarkerTechnique](./harp-datasource-protocol.linemarkertechnique.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[TextRenderStyle](./harp-text-canvas.textrenderstyle.md)
